mapper.select: select p.*, a.accomm_name, a.accomm_idx from payment p join room r on r.room_idx = p.room_idx join accomm a on a.accomm_idx = r.accomm_idx where p.customer_idx = #{customer_idx} and p.refund = #{refund} order by p.payment_idx desc
mapper.update: update payment set refund = 1 where cvc_number = #{cvc_number} and payment_idx = #{payment_idx}
